archdesc.runner: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle: The Papers of Clifton Waller Barrett
did.physdesc: This collection consists of ca. 400 items.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: The Papers of Clifton Waller Barrett, Accession #6526-b, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was deposited in the library on 10 Jan. 1974 [1962].

did.unittitle: Series I: Materials relating to Mr. Barrett's collecting efforts, 16 Hollinger boxes

scopecontent.p: Boxes contain some purchase records, book lists, and catalogs, correspondence with universities, learned societies and dealers, speeches and articles by Mr. Barrett, and various records of his gifts.

Series III: Business, Financial and Family papers of Mr. Barrett.

scopecontent.p: This group consists of personal correspondence, family history, business records of interest, and personal affairs such as University of Virginia activties and the Lake Placid Club

did.unittitle: Personal papers and correspondence, arranged alphabetically and chronologically by folder headings.

scopecontent.p: Included are two business concerns of special importance in Mr. Barrett's career: his steamship companies and the Holt publishing company

did.unittitle: Articles and Speeches by Clifton Waller Barrett which do not relate to collecting 1949-54
